ICS-270A, Intorduction to Artificial Intelligence, Fall 2004
main | announcements | home work | lecture notes

Project

    Planning as search

    1. Blai Bonet and Héctor Geffner, "Planning as Heuristic Search", Artificial Intelligence, 2001.
    2. Blai Bonet and Héctor Geffner, "Heuristic Search Planner 2.0".
    3. Jörg Hoffmann, "A Heuristic for Domain Independent Planning and its Use in an Enforced Hill-Climbing Algorithm", in Proceedings of the 12th International Symposium on Methodologies for Intelligent Systems, Charlotte, North Carolina, USA, October 2000.

    SAT-plan

    1. Henry Kautz and Bart Selman, "Pushing the Envelope: Planning, Propositional Logic, and Stochastic Search", in proceedings of AAAI-96.
    2. Henry Kautz and Bart Selman, "Unifying SAT-based and Graph-based Planning", in proceedings of IJCAI 1999.
    3. Avrim L. Blum and Merrick L. Furst, "Fast Planning Through Planning Graph Analysis", Artificial Intelligence. 90. 1997. p281-300.
    4. Jussi Rintanen, "A Planning Algorithm not based on Directional Search", Proceedings of the Sixth International Conference (KR '98), pages 617-624.

    Cplan

    1. P. van Beek and Xinguang Chen, "CPlan: A Constraint Programming Approach to Planning", In Proceedings of the Sixteenth National Conference on Artificial Intelligence, pages 585-590, Orlando, Florida, 1999.
    2. Subbarao Kambhampati and Romeo Sanchez Nigenda, "Distance-based Goal-ordering heuristics for Graphplan", In proceedings of AIPS-2000.

    Domain Specific

    1. Fahiem Bacchus and Froduald Kabanza, "Using Temporal Logics to Express Search Control Knowledge for Planning", Artificial Intelligence volume 16, pages 123-191, 2000.

    Probabilistic Planning

    1. Stephen M. Majercik and Michael L. Littman, "Using Caching To Solve Larger Probabilistic Planning Problems", in AAAI/IAAI 1998, pages 954-959.
    2. Stephen M. Majercik, "Planning Under Uncertainty Via Stochastic Satisfiability", In Proceedings of the Sixteenth National Conference on Artificial Intelligence, page 950, 1999.
    3. Stephen M. Majercik and Michael L. Littman, "MAXPLAN: A New Approach To Probabilistic Planning", In Proceedings of the Fourth International Conference on Artificial Intelligence Planning Systems, pages 86-93, 1998.

    Other Links

    • Jussi Rintanen's Publications
    • Fahiem Bacchus's Homepage
    • International Summer School on AI Planning
    • Blai Bonet's Homepage (HSP v2.0)
    • Joerg Hoffmann's FF Homepage
    • Durham Planning Group


School of Information and Computer Science University of California, Irvine, CA 92697-3435 Dr. Rina Dechter dechter at ics.uci.edu
